exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce Empty_set to an evaluable reference.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B), Same_set (respectful_set (Empty_set B) f) (Empty_set A)

Premises:
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula For GFormula: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For TT: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For FF: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For X: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For A: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted
Empty_set : forall U : Type, Ensemble U
Same_set = fun (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) => Included B C /\ Included C B : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> Ensemble U -> Prop Argument U is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
respectful_set = fun (A B : Type) (X : Ensemble B) (f : A -> B) (x : A) => X (f x) : forall A B : Type, Ensemble B -> (A -> B) -> Ensemble A Arguments A, B are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope _ function_scope]
Intersection_absort_left : forall (U : Type) (A B : Ensemble U), Included B A -> Same_set (Intersection U A B) B
Complement_Empty_set : forall A : Type, Same_set (Complement A (Empty_set A)) (Full_set A)
Intersection_absort_right : forall (U : Type) (A B : Ensemble U), Included A B -> Same_set (Intersection U A B) A
Inductive image_set (A B : Type) : Ensemble A -> (A -> B) -> Ensemble B := image_set_intro : forall (X : Ensemble A) (f : A -> B) (x : A), X x -> image_set X f (f x) For image_set: Arguments A, B are implicit and maximally inserted For image_set_intro: Arguments A, B are implicit and maximally inserted For image_set: Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope _ function_scope] For image_set_intro: Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope _ function_scope _ _]
resp_Same_set : forall (X Y : Ensemble ?B) (f : ?A -> ?B), Same_set X Y -> Same_set (respectful_set X f) (respectful_set Y f) where ?A : [ |- Type] ?B : [ |- Type]
resp_Union : forall (X Y : Ensemble ?B) (f : ?A -> ?B), Same_set (respectful_set (Union ?B X Y) f) (Union ?A (respectful_set X f) (respectful_set Y f)) where ?A : [ |- Type] ?B : [ |- Type]
resp_Intersection : forall (X Y : Ensemble ?B) (f : ?A -> ?B), Same_set (respectful_set (Intersection ?B X Y) f) (Intersection ?A (respectful_set X f) (respectful_set Y f)) where ?A : [ |- Type] ?B : [ |- Type]
Decidable.dec_and : forall A B : Prop, Decidable.decidable A -> Decidable.decidable B -> Decidable.decidable (A /\ B)
Extensionality_Ensembles : forall (U : Type) (A B : Ensemble U), Same_set A B -> A = B
Included_Empty : forall (U : Type) (A : Ensemble U), Included (Empty_set U) A
Decidable.not_and : forall A B : Prop, Decidable.decidable A -> ~ (A /\ B) -> ~ A \/ ~ B
BinPos.Pos.iter_invariant : forall (p : BinNums.positive) (A : Type) (f : A -> A) (Inv : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, Inv x -> Inv (f x)) -> forall x : A, Inv x -> Inv (BinPos.Pos.iter f x p)
resp_Included : forall (X Y : Ensemble ?B) (f : ?A -> ?B), Included X Y -> Included (respectful_set X f) (respectful_set Y f) where ?A : [ |- Type] ?B : [ |- Type]
resp_Complement : forall (X : Ensemble ?B) (f : ?A -> ?B), Same_set (respectful_set (Complement ?B X) f) (Complement ?A (respectful_set X f)) where ?A : [ |- Type] ?B : [ |- Type]
resp_Disjoint : forall (X Y : Ensemble ?B) (f : ?A -> ?B), Disjoint ?B X Y -> Disjoint ?A (respectful_set X f) (respectful_set Y f) where ?A : [ |- Type] ?B : [ |- Type]
snd = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (_, y) := p in y : forall A B : Type, A * B -> B Arguments A, B are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope _]
respectful_set_proper = fun (A B : Type) (x y : Ensemble B) (H : Same_set x y) (x0 y0 : A -> B) (H0 : pointwise_relation A eq x0 y0) => (fun lemma : Same_set (respectful_set x x0) (respectful_set y y0) <-> pointwise_relation A iff (respectful_set x x0) (respectful_set y y0) => iff_flip_impl_subrelation (Same_set (respectful_set x x0) (respectful_set y y0)) (pointwise_relation A iff (respectful_set x x0) (respectful_set y y0)) lemma) (Same_set_spec A (respectful_set x x0) (respectful_set y y0)) (fun a : A => conj (fun H1 : x (x0 a) => (fun lemma : x (y0 a) <-> y (y0 a) => iff_flip_impl_subrelation (y (y0 a...
BinPosDef.Pos.iter = fun (A : Type) (f : A -> A) => fix iter_fix (x : A) (n : BinNums.positive) {struct n} : A := match n with | BinNums.xI n' => f (iter_fix (iter_fix x n') n') | BinNums.xO n' => iter_fix (iter_fix x n') n' | BinNums.xH => f x end : forall A : Type, (A -> A) -> A -> BinNums.positive -> A Argument A is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope _ positive_scope]
Intersection_Empty_left : forall P : Ensemble ?A, Same_set (Intersection ?A (Empty_set ?A) P) (Empty_set ?A) where ?A : [ |- Type]
Intersection_Empty_right : forall P : Ensemble ?A, Same_set (Intersection ?A P (Empty_set ?A)) (Empty_set ?A) where ?A : [ |- Type]
Noone_in_empty : forall (U : Type) (x : U), ~ In U (Empty_set U) x
Empty_set_iff : forall (U : Type) (x : U), In U (Empty_set U) x < -> False
Union_Empty_left : forall P : Ensemble ?A, Same_set (Union ?A (Empty_set ?A) P) P where ?A : [ |- Type]
Union_Empty_right : forall P : Ensemble ?A, Same_set (Union ?A P (Empty_set ?A)) P where ?A : [ |- Type]
Extension : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U), B = C -> Same_set B C
Union_spec : forall (A : Type) (v : A) (P Q : Ensemble A), Union A P Q v < -> P v \/ Q v
Intersection_spec : forall (A : Type) (v : A) (P Q : Ensemble A), Intersection A P Q v < -> P v /\ Q v
Inductive prod (A B : Type) : Type := pair : A -> B -> A * B For pair: Arguments A, B are implicit and maximally inserted For prod: Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope] For pair: Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope _ _]
Intersection_comm : forall (A : Type) (P Q : Ensemble A), Same_set (Intersection A P Q) (Intersection A Q P)
Union_comm : forall (A : Type) (P Q : Ensemble A), Same_set (Union A P Q) (Union A Q P)

```coq
intros A B f.
unfold respectful_set, Empty_set.
apply Extensionality_Ensembles.
split.
- intros x H.
  destruct H.
  contradiction (Noone_in_empty _ _).
- intros x H.
  destruct H.
  constructor.
  apply Noone_in_empty.
Qed.```
